name: dch_half_wide_char
description: DCH at the head cell of a wide char should delete it and clean up the orphaned continuation
comment: Print A, 中 (wide: cols 1-2), BCD. CUP(1,2) → cursor at (0,1) the wide char head. DCH 1 deletes (0,1), shifts left. The continuation that shifts to (0,1) is orphaned and cleaned up.
